    • Method Detail

      • schedule

        void schedule(Job job,
              net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.Schedule schedule)
        Schedules or reschedules a job in the scheduler. If the job is already running, does not stop its current execution.
        Parameters:
        job - Job to schedule
        schedule - Schedule for the job

      • unschedule

        boolean unschedule(net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.JobKey key)
        Removes a job from the scheduler. Any running execution will be stopped immediately.
        Parameters:
        key - Key of the job to unschedule
        Returns:
        True if the job was running and had to be stopped

      • pause

        void pause()
        Pauses the scheduler

      • resume

        void resume()
        Resumes the scheduler

      • pause

        boolean pause(net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.JobKey key)
        Pauses the execution of a job
        Parameters:
        key - Key of the job to pause
        Returns:
        true if the job was paused
        Throws:
        net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.support.JobNotScheduledException - If the job is not scheduled

      • resume

        boolean resume(net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.JobKey key)
        Resumes the execution of a job
        Parameters:
        key - Key of the job to resume
        Returns:
        true if the job was resumed
        Throws:
        net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.support.JobNotScheduledException - If the job is not scheduled

      • getJobStatus

        java.util.Optional<net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.JobStatus> getJobStatus(net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.JobKey key)
        Gets the status for a job
        Parameters:
        key - Key of the job to get a status for
        Returns:
        The job status or empty if not found.

      • getAllJobKeys

        java.util.Collection<net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.JobKey> getAllJobKeys()
        Gets all the job keys
        Returns:
        List of all job keys, never null

      • getJobKeysOfType

        java.util.Collection<net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.JobKey> getJobKeysOfType(net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.JobType type)
        Gets all the job keys for a type of job
        Parameters:
        type - Job type
        Returns:
        List of job keys for this type

      • getJobKeysOfCategory

        java.util.Collection<net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.JobKey> getJobKeysOfCategory(net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.JobCategory category)
        Gets all the job keys for a category of jobs
        Parameters:
        category - Job category
        Returns:
        List of job keys for this category

      • getJobStatuses

        java.util.Collection<net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.JobStatus> getJobStatuses()
        Gets the list of job statuses
        Returns:
        All job statuses (never null)

      • fireImmediately

        java.util.Optional<java.util.concurrent.Future<?>> fireImmediately(net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.JobKey jobKey)
        Fires a job immediately, without waiting the schedule
        Parameters:
        jobKey - Key of the job to fire immediately
        Returns:
        Future for the job execution
        Throws:
        net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.support.JobNotScheduledException - If the job is not scheduled

      • getJobKey

        java.util.Optional<net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.JobKey> getJobKey(long id)
        Gets the job key for a job id

      • stop

        boolean stop(net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.JobKey key)
        Stops a running a job.
        Parameters:
        key - Key of the job to run
        Returns:
        true if the job was stopped, false if the job could not be stopped or was not running.
        Throws:
        net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.support.JobNotScheduledException - If the job is not scheduled

      • isPaused

        boolean isPaused()
        Checks the general status of the scheduler.
        Returns:
        true if the scheduler is paused.
